text:
The Central government on Wednesday appointed three Commissioners at the Central Information Commission (CIC).

Amitava Bhattacharyya, 1980 batch IAS officer; Bimal Julka, 1979 batch IAS officer; and Divya Prakash Sinha, 1979 batch IPS officer, have been made Information Commissioners. — Special Correspondent
title: CIC gets three Commissioners
